column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The wait wasn't long because I chose to sit at the bar. For an appetizer
column2: I had the Jinya Bun. It was the best bun I've ever had. The meat was delicate
column4: and as soft as the pillow. My friend ordered the takoyaki. This is probably one of the best takoyaki I've ever had. The sauce was to die for.
